title: Railway Minister assures improvement in railway connectivity with ports
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 9 (APP): Federal Minister for Railways Azam Khan Swati on Friday visited Port Qasim Authority (PQA) and assured improvement in railway connectivity with ports and support for new projects.
Chairman PQA Rear Admiral (R) Syed Hasan Nasir Shah and other senior officials warmly received the minister, said a press release.
The minister was briefed about the operational activities and future projects of Port Qasim.
In his remarks, he appreciated PQA performance and potential.
